comment: She has a good heart and is a very nice lady, but her class is basically a joke. Extremely easy... didn't learn a thing. I would recommend this class for someone that struggles with English and writing. It's a very beginner level class. If you are a good writer you'll be bored out of your mind. I barely showed up and made an A.

Mrs. Merrills was a great english teacher and also a very nice person. Her asssignments are straighforward and she was always available if we needed help. Her class was also pretty easy. Only one paper due that had to be 5 pages and everyother wednesday was online. I highly recommend her.
Mrs. Merrills is a wonderful teacher, and it is easy to see that she truly loves what she is doing.  Great Class!
